description: This file contains the implementation of the HTTP Atomic Header Object, including functions for creation, initialization, enrollment of component objects, and removal. It defines the core logic for managing HTTP header code and name tables within an object-oriented C framework.

classes.name: HTTP_ATO_HEADER_OBJECT
classes.description: A structure representing the HTTP Atomic Header Object, including fields for object identifiers, function pointers for operations, and tables for header codes and names.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpAtoHeaderCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new HTTP Atomic Header Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoHeaderRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the HTTP Atomic Header Object, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoHeaderEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required component objects for the header object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAtoHeaderInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the member variables and function pointers of the HTTP header object, including setting up code and name tables.
